fields_of_interest: General and Institutional Affairs, Economy, finance and the euro, Trade, Competition, Consumers, Employment and Social Affairs, Taxation, Justice and Fundamental Rights, Single market, Digital economy and society, Banking and financial services
eu_initiatives: CAPITAL MARKETS UNION, UCITS v, MIFID II, PRIPS, CMD V, AIFMD, PEPP, SRD II, AML, EUVECA-EUSEF, BENCHMARKS, SECURITISATION, IFRS 9, FTT, MMFs, CCTB & CCCTB, GDPR.
organisation_name: ΕΝΩΣΗ ΘΕΣΜΙΚΩΝ ΕΠΕΝΔΥΤΩΝ - HELLENIC FUND AND ASSET MANAGEMENT ASSOCIATION (Ε.Θ.Ε.)
section: II - In-house lobbyists and trade/business/professional associations
goals__remit: We are a private law non profit company, the trade association representing Mutual Fund Management Companies, Asset Management firms, REICs, Portfolio Investment Companies, and other AIFMs. Our purpose is to promote the industry of above mentioned collective investment schemes and professional discretionary asset management.
